title: Heu Ernte 2020 LU Uwe Wulf Schwaden und Pressen (Fendt Claas Krone Mchale [Yuneec])Landwirtschaft

tasks.task: Turn around to face the adjusting bar
subtasks: Position body to face the adjusting bar

tasks.task: Insert stake into the adjuster and rotate the wheel handle
subtasks: Grip handle with hand
Rotate handle to turn the adjuster

tasks.task: Extend hand to grasp the furrow opener's handle
subtasks: Reach out with hand to find the handle
Grip the handle firmly

tasks.task: Remove the furrow opener from the soil
subtasks: Apply force to lift the opener

tasks.task: Adjust the furrow opener to the proper depth
subtasks: Use handle or lever to adjust the depth

tasks.task: Check the tension on the adjuster cable
subtasks: Locate the adjuster cable
Inspect the cable tension

tasks.task: Align the wheel angle using the adjuster wheel
subtasks: Rotate the wheel handle to adjust the angle

tasks.task: Confirm the correct filler size for the air pressure regulator
subtasks: Check the current filler size
Select the appropriate size if necessary

tasks.task: Inflate the wheel air pressure
subtasks: Connect the air hose to the regulator
Turn the valve to add air pressure

tasks.task: Spin the wheel to check the rate of inflation
subtasks: Rotate the wheel to observe the resistance
Ensure consistent inflation rate

tasks.task: Take rest breaks as needed during the day
subtasks: Find a shaded area or sit while resting
Remove footwear and prop legs against a field edge
